overview:
Mr. Baumbach has 30 years of senior financial and operational management experience, primarily in service and technology companies. His experience ranges from $1billion companies to pre revenue start-ups, as well as 8 years as a CPA with Ernst & Young which included 3 years on E&Yâ€™s national office accounting and auditing staff.

Fredâ€™s private company experience includes serving as the senior financial executive for early stage technology ventures (Brickstream Corporation, Silverpop Systems) as well as holding senior financial positions at other technology and service companies (Cox Enterprises, Norrell Health Care, Lynk Systems). Fred also owned a software company for 4 years which sold software to homebuilders in the Atlanta market and nationwide. As a partner at TechCFO, he consults with numerous early stage bio science and technology companies. He has helped secure multiple rounds of both equity and debt financing for his previous companies and clients.
